name: Coldfire
description:
The bullets that are from distant enemies do not do damage, though they do not diespawn as they should.  Only enemies within the camera view, or just out of it, do damage.

This is the updated version, the prior one had some issues with bullet size and level loading.  This one still has some bullet-size issues, but it's better than it was.  At least you can see them.  Very clearly at that...
